alert.note: Alert for Osage; Pawnee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 10:41PM CDT until June 17 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... Pawnee County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1041 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Geuda Springs to 4 miles east of Blackwell to 4 miles northeast of Covington, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations in or near the path include... Pawhuska... Pawnee... Hominy... Fairfax... Shidler... Wynona... Ralston... Burbank... Hallett... Blackburn... Maramec... Skedee... Grainola... Foraker... Bigheart... Pearsonia... Sunset Lake... Osage Hills State Park... Webb City... Apperson... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
